{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Front Desk Officer",
  "description": "Changeroom was established in 2012 with a vision to produce quality human resource solutions. We plan to achieve this by partnering with our clients to provide highly specialized consulting services in the areas of human resources development and business management services. Our partnership approach affords us the opportunity of working with you to find the most efficient and appropriate solutions to meet your short, medium and long-term goals. In partnering with your organization, we make it our business to understand your business, embrace its values, aims and objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Schedule appointments, meetings, and manage calendars for staff and for meeting rooms.
	Perform clerical duties such as filing, data entry, photocopying, and managing incoming and outgoing mail and deliveries.
	Maintain a clean, organized, and presentable reception area.
	Monitor visitor access and ensure security procedures are followed.
	Monitor and manage office supplies and order replacements as needed.
	Greet and welcome visitors, answer their questions, and direct them to the appropriate person or department.
	Answer, screen, and forward incoming phone calls, and manage inquiries via phone, email, and in-person.
	Ability to provide a positive and professional first impression.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills.
	Excellent organizational and time-management skills to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
	Experience with office equipment like computers, printers, and multi-line phone systems.
	Necessary for accurate data entry, record keeping, and administrative tasks.


Requirement


	Male only with OND.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;ginika@changeroom.ng&nbsp;and copy&nbsp;bola@changeroom.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-10",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-23",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "The Changeroom"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "191645"
  },

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {

}



Front Desk Officer Job at the Changeroom




        
    

        
        Changeroom was established in 2012 with a vision to produce quality human resource solutions. We plan to achieve this by partnering with our clients to provide highly specialized consulting services in the areas of human resources development and business management services. Our partnership approach affords us the opportunity of working with you to find the most efficient and appropriate solutions to meet your short, medium and long-term goals. In partnering with your organization, we make it our business to understand your business, embrace its values, aims and objectives.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Front Desk Officer
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Responsibilities


	Schedule appointments, meetings, and manage calendars for staff and for meeting rooms.
	Perform clerical duties such as filing, data entry, photocopying, and managing incoming and outgoing mail and deliveries.
	Maintain a clean, organized, and presentable reception area.
	Monitor visitor access and ensure security procedures are followed.
	Monitor and manage office supplies and order replacements as needed.
	Greet and welcome visitors, answer their questions, and direct them to the appropriate person or department.
	Answer, screen, and forward incoming phone calls, and manage inquiries via phone, email, and in-person.
	Ability to provide a positive and professional first impression.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills.
	Excellent organizational and time-management skills to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.
	Experience with office equipment like computers, printers, and multi-line phone systems.
	Necessary for accurate data entry, record keeping, and administrative tasks.


Requirement


	Male only with OND.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ginika@changeroom.ng and copy bola@changeroom.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Backend Engineer",
  "description": "Jeroid Limited is a leading Nigerian fintech company offering innovative solutions in cryptocurrency trading, gift card redemption, and digital payments. With a user base of over 200,000, we are committed to delivering secure, fast, and reliable services. At Jeroid, we value exceptional customer experiences and are seeking a dedicated Customer Service Representative to join our growing team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Backend Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are looking for a skilled and proactive Backend Engineer to join our growing fintech team in Yaba, specializing in cryptocurrency trading, gift card redemption, and digital payments.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, maintain, and optimize backend systems and APIs to support web and mobile applications.
	Collaborate with frontend developers and cross-functional teams to implement new features.
	Ensure the security, scalability, and reliability of backend services.
	Work on blockchain and Web3 integrations to support fintech operations.
	Participate in code reviews, testing, and continuous improvement of engineering standards.


Requirements:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
	Strong experience with PHP and Node.js backend development.
	Knowledge of Web3 technologies and blockchain integration.
	Experience in the finance or fintech industry is highly desirable.
	Familiarity with databases (SQL &amp; NoSQL) and cloud services.
	Strong problem-solving, analytical, and debugging skills.
	Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
	Proximity to Yaba is an added advantage.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;Vacancy@jeroid.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",

  },

Backend Engineer Job at Jeroid Limited




        
    

        
        Jeroid Limited is a leading Nigerian fintech company offering innovative solutions in cryptocurrency trading, gift card redemption, and digital payments. With a user base of over 200,000, we are committed to delivering secure, fast, and reliable services. At Jeroid, we value exceptional customer experiences and are seeking a dedicated Customer Service Representative to join our growing team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Backend Engineer

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a skilled and proactive Backend Engineer to join our growing fintech team in Yaba, specializing in cryptocurrency trading, gift card redemption, and digital payments.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, maintain, and optimize backend systems and APIs to support web and mobile applications.
	Collaborate with frontend developers and cross-functional teams to implement new features.
	Ensure the security, scalability, and reliability of backend services.
	Work on blockchain and Web3 integrations to support fintech operations.
	Participate in code reviews, testing, and continuous improvement of engineering standards.


Requirements:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
	Strong experience with PHP and Node.js backend development.
	Knowledge of Web3 technologies and blockchain integration.
	Experience in the finance or fintech industry is highly desirable.
	Familiarity with databases (SQL & NoSQL) and cloud services.
	Strong problem-solving, analytical, and debugging skills.
	Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
	Proximity to Yaba is an added advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Vacancy@jeroid.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive Assistant",
  "description": "Welcome to Bottleking Limited, the Minister of Enjoyment, at 27 Castle Rock Ave, Lekki Peninsula II, Lekki 105102, Lagos. We specialize in offering an exquisite selection of exotic wines and premium drinks. Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name in the beverage industry. At Bottleking, we believe in celebrating life&#39;s moments with the finest drinks from around the world. Join us and experience the true taste of luxury.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos,&nbsp;Hybrid &mdash; 2 days a week onsite. Occasionally, may resume at the employer&rsquo;s residence
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We&rsquo;re looking for a smart, proactive young professional (22&ndash;27 years old) to support a fast-paced executive. NYSC corps members are welcome to apply.


Requirements


	Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
	Organised, reliable, and able to work with discretion
	Female candidates preferred.
	Preferred Residence: Yaba, Surulere, Lekki&ndash;Ajah axis (for safety and proximity).


Compensation


	N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.
	Device allowance
	Monthly data allowance.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;hr@bottleking.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-10",
  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Bottleking Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",

Executive Assistant Job at Bottleking Limited




        
    

        
        Welcome to Bottleking Limited, the Minister of Enjoyment, at 27 Castle Rock Ave, Lekki Peninsula II, Lekki 105102, Lagos. We specialize in offering an exquisite selection of exotic wines and premium drinks. Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name in the beverage industry. At Bottleking, we believe in celebrating life's moments with the finest drinks from around the world. Join us and experience the true taste of luxury.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant 

Job Location: Lagos, Hybrid — 2 days a week onsite. Occasionally, may resume at the employer’s residence
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Description


	We’re looking for a smart, proactive young professional (22–27 years old) to support a fast-paced executive. NYSC corps members are welcome to apply.


Requirements


	Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
	Organised, reliable, and able to work with discretion
	Female candidates preferred.
	Preferred Residence: Yaba, Surulere, Lekki–Ajah axis (for safety and proximity).


Compensation


	N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.
	Device allowance
	Monthly data allowance.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: hr@bottleking.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Data Analyst",
  "description": "Jeroid Limited is a leading Nigerian fintech company offering innovative solutions in cryptocurrency trading, gift card redemption, and digital payments. With a user base of over 200,000, we are committed to delivering secure, fast, and reliable services. At Jeroid, we value exceptional customer experiences and are seeking a dedicated Customer Service Representative to join our growing team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Data Analyst

Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Collect, clean, and analyze data from multiple sources to support business decisions.
	Generate reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders.
	Work with cross-functional teams to identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement.
	Maintain and update data documentation to ensure accuracy and consistency.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Data Science, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field.
	Strong knowledge of SQL for data extraction and manipulation.
	Proficient in Excel and familiarity with pivot tables, formulas, and data analysis tools.
	Basic understanding of data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau) is a plus.
	Strong analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication skills and ability to present insights clearly.
	Proximity is an added advantage.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;Vacancy@jeroid.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  },

Data Analyst Job at Jeroid Limited




        
    

        
        Jeroid Limited is a leading Nigerian fintech company offering innovative solutions in cryptocurrency trading, gift card redemption, and digital payments. With a user base of over 200,000, we are committed to delivering secure, fast, and reliable services. At Jeroid, we value exceptional customer experiences and are seeking a dedicated Customer Service Representative to join our growing team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Data Analyst

Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Collect, clean, and analyze data from multiple sources to support business decisions.
	Generate reports, dashboards, and visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders.
	Work with cross-functional teams to identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement.
	Maintain and update data documentation to ensure accuracy and consistency.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Data Science, Statistics, Economics, Computer Science, or a related field.
	Strong knowledge of SQL for data extraction and manipulation.
	Proficient in Excel and familiarity with pivot tables, formulas, and data analysis tools.
	Basic understanding of data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau) is a plus.
	Strong analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail.
	Excellent communication skills and ability to present insights clearly.
	Proximity is an added advantage.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Vacancy@jeroid.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
